LanguageData.GU_Car_NotReachable_DropAnimal_NPC_Messa: Visitor could not reach NPC Drop off point. Make sure all NPC drop off points are reachable.
LanguageData.GU_Car_visitorMountChance_Title: Visitors mount chance (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.GU_Car_visitorMountChance_Description: Chance that visitors of a preindustrial faction will show up riding upon an animal.
LanguageData.GU_Car_visitorMountChanceTribal_Title: Pre-industrial visitors mount chance (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.GU_Car_visitorMountChanceTribal_Descript: Chance that visitors of a pre-industrial faction will show up riding upon an animal.
LanguageData.GU_Car_Designator_GU_DropAnimal_NPC_Expa: Place drop off spots for guest mounts. When traders or visitors arrive, they will temporarily leave their mounts at the mount spot closest to the place they gather. Mounts will stay near the drop off point until their rider returns.
